sub_title: Head of Marketing & Experience at Dr. Hauschka  Benelux
summary:
Remember that game 'I spy'? I used to play it with my sister in the back of the car. The game didn't last long though. After I guessed "cow" correctly, my sister would give up after a few attempts of guessing what I had spied. "You're making it too difficult!" she said.  She was right. My little eye didn't spy for trees, windmills and animals. I spied for text, colours, imagery and logos on company busses that would flash by. They were imprinted in my brain like pictures. Maybe that’s where my passion for communication & design started.    

I love marketing, I love design, and my inner-nerd loves data and development. Most of all I love bridging the gaps between these disciplines. I'm not your woman if you're looking for someone who can get 'over the moon enthusiastic' when hearing the word SEA. However, if you are looking for someone who truly knows how to reach and engage your audience via data analysis, brand building, creative online campaigns and concepts - I'm the digital-savvy one for you. Take a peek at my profile below and don't hesitate to invite me over for a cup of coffee or tea.

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

awards.title: Honor Programme Communicationscience: Media & Persuasive Communication

projects.title: Digital marketing, social media and content strategy training
projects.description: Throughout the years at Vlisco, I trained marketing employees, customers and starting entrepreneurs in digital marketing, social media and content strategy. Subjects of this training included: audience insights (research, personas, user moments), consumer journeys, goal setting, content creation (online consumer needs, copywriting, artwork creation, brand consistency), influencer marketing, WhatsApp marketing planning, scheduling and publishing, targetting, funnels, online advertising (Facebook, Instagram, SEA), driving (foot) traffic, community management, measuring and analysing (offline) conversion.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing & Experience at Dr. Hauschka  Benelux

projects.title: Vlisco Women's Month Website
projects.description: The 8th of March is International Women’s Day. Because Vlisco feels women should remain in the spotlight for longer than just one day, it celebrates Women’s Month: a tribute to women in West- and Central Africa. During the month of March, women in Nigeria, Ghana, DRCongo, Ivory Coast, Benin and Togo are nominated for their efforts to make a positive impact on their community and environment. Also, during this month female fashion entrepreneurs get the chance to pitch their business plan in order to win funding for realising their fashion dream. To support this campaign a website was needed where the nominees and their stories could be presented, where people could vote for their favourite nominee and where the fashion entrepreneurs could pitch their business plan and upload their portfolio. During the project, I was the Product Owner and Scrum Master and collaborated closely with the content manager and marketing & e-commerce director at Vlisco and freelance developers. My tasks during this project included: concept development, translation of the concept into briefings, UX design, content creation and curation, testing, planning and budgeting.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing & Experience at Dr. Hauschka  Benelux

projects.title: Current Vlisco website
projects.description: After a revised brand identity for Vlisco, along came the need for a new website. I was the product owner and scrum master and the one responsible for the new website. During the project, I collaborated closely with the creative director, content manager, marketing and e-commerce director at Vlisco, freelance front- and backend developers and concept developers at Studio Lust. My tasks during this project included: concept development, translation of the concept into briefings, UX design, content creation and curation, testing, planning and budgeting.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing & Experience at Dr. Hauschka  Benelux

projects.title: Online Global Content Calendar
projects.description: In order to create alignment between the global and local marketing teams (Nigeria, Ghana, DRCongo,  Ivory Coast, Benin and Togo) and what should be communicated when and where to our consumers and customers, I developed an online Global Content Calendar. With this calendar important special moments throughout the consumer journey where highlighted, launch dates were aligned, tasks and responsibilities were set out and content sharing and evaluation was made easy.

contributors.headline: Head of Marketing & Experience at Dr. Hauschka  Benelux

projects.title: Vlisco VR Experience
projects.description: For the Vlisco un à un 1:1 exhibition showcased in Nigeria, Ghana, DRCongo, Ivory Coast, Benin and Togo, I developed a concept that would give our customers and fans in West- and Central Africa the opportunity to take a peek behind the curtains at Vlisco. I was the product owner and scrum master, and responsible for the Vlisco VR Experience. During the project, I worked closely with the creative director and content manager of Vlisco, but also with VR agency Scopic and production agency Hotel Rebel. My tasks during this project included: concept development, translation of the concept into briefings, script & copywriting, production, planning, budgeting. The experience was a great success, introducing VR to West & Central Africa, having customers and fans experience the world of Vlisco and taking a peek into the factory. The VR experience is still used today for new customers, employees and training purposes.

profile_positions.description: Professionalise Dr. Hauschka Esthetician channel by creating concept and development for Dr. Hauschka Esthetician growth programme, including creation & roll-out co-op agreements. Development and roll-out new initiation and training programme Dr. Hauschka employees, estheticians, retailers and end consumers. Concept, development and launch online academy. Content creation e-learning video's and life-phase content. Concept, development, roll-out of House of Dr. Hauschka platform. Member MT.

Develop yearly Marketing Calendar and the supporting 360° campaigns. Ensure online brand awareness in-line with brand identity and tone of voice. Setting up strategic collaborations and partnerships. Member MT.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing & Education

profile_positions.description: Stimulate growth cross-discipline- and departments | Analyse trends, marketing efforts & customer data to identify opportunities and improvements | Development personas & customer journeys | Content strategy creation | Ensuring 360° communication | Campaign development | Developing service concepts using Design Thinking method
profile_positions.title: Growth Engineer

profile_positions.description: Set-up digital marketing strategy and implementation plans. Manage digital media presence and online customer experience. Planning online content calendar. Analyse, evaluate and improve digital marketing efforts. Analyse emerging trends and technologies. Budget and team management. Train local marketeers Nigeria, Ghana, DRCongo, Ivory Coast, Togo, Benin.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Develop social media strategy. Manage social media channels (Facebook +1M fans, Instagram +100K followers). Concept creation and implementation of online marketing campaigns. Daily content creation and planning for social media. Online advertising and A/B testing. Develop, maintain and guarantee Vlisco's Social Media presence and all of its assets in line with the Vlisco Brand and Brand Innovation Strategy, both Seasonal and Non-seasonal, by using design thinking methodology.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Developer - Brand Innovation

profile_positions.description: Online marketing consultancy. Brand identity and digital design. Webdesign and development.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: During my internship at Veldhoven Group, I conducted research into the way in which fashion brand Sandwich could use social media as research tools in order to obtain qualitative consumer insights. This research was carried out in four phases: 1) a literature study, 2) in-depth target audience research and representation of this audience via the creation of personas, 3) a social media strategy and implementation plan for Sandwich.
profile_positions.title: Intern Social Media & Consumer Insights

profile_positions.description: During my internship at Mexx, I mainly focused on creating a brand experience for fashion brand 'xx by Mexx'. The goal of this brand experience was to increase brand loyalty amongst their target audience. Two questions that were central to my research were: "What exactly does a brand experience entail?", and "How can social media be used to create and increase brand loyalty?".
profile_positions.title: Intern Experience Branding - Marketing & Communication

profile_positions.description:
Consumer analysis and competition research. Concept development and execution. 
Webdesign and development. Evaluate user experience for online and digital concepts.
profile_positions.title: Concept developer & multi-media designer

profile_positions.description: During my internship at 'Esens Design & Communication, I dealt with various aspects of design and communication. Firstly, I carried out tasks such as target audience analyses, competition and product research and writing a business case. Secondly, this was concept development, in which I developed concepts for websites, apps, presentations, brand identities, posters, flyers, banners, etc. Thirdly, this was the implementation of these concepts or the technical realization of it. A final aspect was the evaluation of these concepts, such as usability research and feedback to the customer.
profile_positions.title: Intern Multimedia Design
